titles.title: Census Data Fair Share Act of 1993
To provide interim current census data on below poverty, urban, rural, and farm populations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census, Statistics and Postal Personnel.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Census Data Fair Share Act of 1993 - Requires the Secretary of Commerce to annually produce and publish current data or estimates on below poverty, urban, rural, and farm populations, for each State, urban area, and rural area for which data is compiled in the most recent decennial census of population. Authorizes such data or estimates to be produced by means of sampling or other methods which the Secretary determines will produce current, comprehensive, and reliable data or estimates.
